com.optimizely.ab.android.datafile_handler

Class DatafileClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.optimizely.ab.android.datafile_handler.DatafileClient

  • public class DatafileClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Makes requests to the Optly CDN to get the datafile

      java.lang.String request(java.lang.String urlString)
      If the datafile is modified on the CDN since the last time our local datafile was modified the response body will be a valid Optimizely datafile and the response code will be 200.

    • Method Detail

      • request

        @Nullable
public java.lang.String request(java.lang.String urlString)
        If the datafile is modified on the CDN since the last time our local datafile was modified the response body will be a valid Optimizely datafile and the response code will be 200. If the datafile has not been modified since last time our local datafile was modified there will be no response body and the response code will be 304.
        Parameters:
        urlString - the CDN url of an Optimizely datafile
        Returns:
        a valid datafile, null, or an empty string (on 304 responses)
